A winter storm is set to impact NYC and the Tri-State area with snow and rain, complicating holiday travel, while recent incidents of violence and accidents, including a car crash in Queens and subway slashings, raise safety concerns in the city.

### Risks & Alerts

- Storm to bring widespread snow and mix across NYC, Tri-State area Friday night into Saturday morning. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- 3 people injured after car slams into building and strikes pedestrians in Queens, NYC. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Snow and rain mix threatens to snarl holiday travel in New York, New Jersey area. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- New York woman killed in three-car crash on I-95. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMijAFBVV95cUxPMWs0Y0lsMFhjNFI0aGtFNkdIWXVHMS1iWkZfbG9xcFdTdWZ3VHRTYktBSzZuZGFUU21XLU5tMVd3RldveEVFdnhxMnNFVmRWS3FlT2dyVjBiRHJlMFB3b2xrVG15WS00SHNiQ2d1R1BzN2c1eE1wTHZJZ1NLOEdaWlMtX3pkLWtPVWt4Tw?oc=5)
- After Staten Island battery energy storage site’s 3rd fire, BP calls locations ‘dangerous’. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Four NYC subway slashings reported over the weekend. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitwFBVV95cUxQVnVpZmxsX21rSnVrQ2R3X21HcXl3bGJUS0dDT2k3T25tbU52Y09UU09LX1RHcTFCZEI1MXZuXzgwUVNkUVFrWWVlRWhiSGJsWVNkTTJtdkN2YWxLQVJ6dGtHZ2F2NTdEYlFMUXlWSFoxY2I2Wi1pUnlmam5nTTBZVkh3Q1hkekRITjh0ZnZsY3RlRFRpTWtjQl9pazI2LXJBOW95UFAtd2lTcXZkcHdsdkZWVWFvWFU?oc=5)
